entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
